posts.post_content:
I am selling a raw lot of 90 T-205s (85 unique, 5 duplicates).  The lot ranges in condition from P to VG-EX (maybe a borderline EX or two) and consists of a variety of backs including some tougher ones (Cycle, American Beauty and Piedmont F42).  Some key cards of interest are as follows:

Barger (Partial B On Cap)
Brown (HOF)
Chase (Both Ears Showing, Frame Ends Bellow Shoulders)
Clarke (HOF)
Collins (HOF, Mouth Closed)
Collins (HOF, ML)
Dougherty (White Sock)
Duffy (HOF)
Fischer
Graham (Cubs)
Hoblitzell (Cin After 1908 In Stats)
Mathewson (HOF)
Rowan
Sweeney
Tinker (HOF)
Wallace (HOF, No Cap, Two Lines of 1910 Stats)
Walsh (HOF)
White (Pirates)

A complete list of the cards is available in spreadsheet form via email.  Front and back scans of all cards may be viewed at the following links:

[url]http://s437.photobucket.com/albums/qq91/OriginalTrekkerMike/T-205s%20For%20Sale/[/url]

[url]http://s437.photobucket.com/albums/qq91/OriginalTrekkerMike/T-205%20Hall%20of%20Famers/[/url]

My asking price for the lot is $2000 (including shipping and handling) which is my cost basis.  Acceptable forms of payment are personal check, cashier or bank check or postal money order.  Shipping will be via USPS Registered Mail.

I HAVE NO INTEREST IN BREAKING UP THIS LOT.  IF I DO NOT FIND A BUYER THROUGH THIS FORUM, I WILL PURSUE AN ALTERNATIVE MEANS OF SELLING THESE CARDS TOGETHER.

Thank you for your attention and interest.

posts.post_title: FS: T-205 Lot of 90 (NEW LOWER PRICE)
posts.post_content: New Year's Bump!  I have lowered my asking price to $2000 for this lot of T-205s consisting of nearly 50% of the set.
